member.name: WICDdsParameters
member.summary: Specifies the DDS image dimension, and alpha mode of contained data.

member.name: WICDdsParameters.Width
member.summary: The width, in pixels, of the texture at the largest mip size (mip level 0).

member.name: WICDdsParameters.Height
member.summary: The height, in pixels, of the texture at the largest mip size (mip level 0). When the DDS image contains a 1-dimensional texture, this value is equal to 1.

member.name: WICDdsParameters.Depth
member.summary: The number of slices in the 3D texture. This is equivalent to the depth, in pixels, of the 3D texture at the largest mip size (mip level 0). When the DDS image contains a 1- or 2-dimensional texture, this value is equal to 1.

member.name: WICDdsParameters.MipLevels
member.summary: The number of mip levels contained in the DDS image.

member.name: WICDdsParameters.ArraySize
member.summary: The number of textures in the array in the DDS image.

member.name: WICDdsParameters.DxgiFormat
member.summary: The of the DDS pixel data.

member.name: WICDdsParameters.Dimension
member.summary: Specifies the dimension type of the data contained in DDS image (1D, 2D, 3D or cube texture).

member.name: WICDdsParameters.AlphaMode
member.summary: Specifies the alpha behavior of the DDS image.
